Package WebStack.Resources

Common resources for WebStack applications.

Copyright (C) 2004, 2005 Paul Boddie <paul@boddie.org.uk>

You should have received a copy of the GNU Lesser General Public License along with this library; if not, write to the Free Software Foundation, Inc., 59 Temple Place, Suite 330, Boston, MA 02111-1307 USA
Submodules
  • Login: Login resources which redirect clients back to an application after a successful login.
  • LoginRedirect: Login redirection resources, sending unauthenticated users to a login screen URL.
  • ResourceMap: Mapping from names to resources.
  • Static: Resources for serving static content.
